document_data.mainbody:
ist Arrinye was a member of the Flaming Fist mercenary company from the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Arrinye had a fair complexion with long light chestnut hair. She wore a set of leather armor as a part of her Flaming Fist uniform and was armed with a deadly heavy crossbow.
In the , Fist Arrinye was stationed within the barracks of the Heapside district of Baldurs Gate, where she, a steel watcher, and several other Flaming Fists guarded a small dungeon prison.
